name: Creature
description:
This is Creature - created during Ludum Dare 37. This is my first attempt at moderately complex physics in Unity.

Your goal is to collect 20 rocks into the rainbow square without dying. You can defeat enemies with your tail using Q and E, and grasp rocks with W. Arrow keys will move you about the level.

Enemy art by the talented Anton Tamarin. You can see more stuff by him at http://lonely2012.deviantart.com
